name: Mirror maze (TheMissPressed, FatherOfTheWolf)
description:
You run around the maze solve laser puzzles and try to get to the end.

Controls:

Move left - a

Move right - d

Move up - w

Move down -s

To move the mirrors you first have to left click on them to select them. If you want to deselect just left click them again.

controls to rotate mirrors:

rotate left - a

rotate right - d

Good luck and have fun. Sorry for the bugs, we suck :( .

Code: TheMissPressed

Art & Music: FatherOfTheWolf
